graph.original_query: How much revenue has Dhurandhar Movie made till now?

globals_schema.formatted_revenue_report_T001:
Dhurandhar Movie Revenue Report (as of December 2025)

This report details the revenue generated by the movie "Dhurandhar" as of December 2025. The data presented is compiled from available sources and provides a comprehensive overview of the movie's financial performance.

Executive Summary

"Dhurandhar" has achieved significant box office success, generating substantial revenue worldwide. As of December 23, 2025, the movie has grossed $21,877,727,399 globally. Earlier data, from December 22, 2025, indicates the movie grossed over Rs 800 crore (8 billion) worldwide, with an estimated $108,120,000 USD. The India collection totaled Rs 712.98 crore, and overseas gross collection reached Rs 188.02 crore. These figures highlight the strong performance of "Dhurandhar" in both domestic and international markets. Discrepancies in reported revenue figures are discussed below.

Revenue Breakdown

Worldwide Gross Revenue

As of December 23, 2025, "Dhurandhar" has a worldwide gross revenue of $21,877,727,399. This figure represents the most up-to-date information available regarding the movie's total earnings.

Revenue as of December 22, 2025

On December 22, 2025, the movie had grossed over Rs 800 crore (8 billion) worldwide. In USD terms, the revenue was approximately $108,120,000. This includes:

  • India Collection: Rs 712.98 crore
  • Overseas Gross Collection: Rs 188.02 crore

Revenue Data Table

Date Revenue (USD) Revenue (INR) Region
December 23, 2025 $21,877,727,399 N/A Worldwide
December 22, 2025 $108,120,000 (Estimated) Rs 800 crore (Approx.) Worldwide
December 22, 2025 N/A Rs 712.98 crore India
December 22, 2025 N/A Rs 188.02 crore Overseas

Analysis of Revenue Discrepancies

There is a significant discrepancy between the reported revenue as of December 23, 2025 ($21,877,727,399) and the estimated revenue as of December 22, 2025 ($108,120,000). This difference could be attributed to several factors:

  • Data Source Reliability: The accuracy and reliability of the sources providing the revenue data may vary.
  • Currency Conversion Rates: Fluctuations in currency exchange rates between INR and USD can affect the converted revenue figures.
  • Reporting Delays: There may be delays in reporting revenue from different regions, leading to incomplete data on December 22, 2025.
  • Data Updates: The December 23, 2025 figure may include updated revenue data from additional sources or regions not accounted for in the December 22, 2025 estimate.
  • Possible Error It is possible that one of the revenue figures is incorrect. With such a large difference in revenue on back to back days, this is a plausible explanation.

Further investigation into the data sources and reporting methodologies is recommended to reconcile these discrepancies and provide a more accurate and consistent revenue picture.

Conclusion

"Dhurandhar" has demonstrated a strong financial performance, achieving significant revenue both in India and worldwide. While there are discrepancies in the reported revenue figures, the overall success of the movie is evident. Continued monitoring of revenue data and reconciliation of discrepancies will provide a more accurate understanding of the movie's financial impact.

nodes.description: Present revenue of Dhurandhar Movie based on memory.
nodes.agent_prompt:
Present the revenue information of the movie "Dhurandhar" as of December 2025 based on the following facts:
- The movie "dhurandhar" has a worldwide gross revenue of $21,877,727,399 as of December 23, 2025.
- As of December 22, 2025, Dhurandhar movie has grossed over Rs 800 crore (8 billion) worldwide.
- As of December 22, 2025, Dhurandhar movie has grossed an estimated $108,120,000 USD worldwide, with a total India collection of Rs 712.98 crore and overseas gross collection of Rs 188.02 crore. Create a well-formatted markdown report that includes all the revenue data available.
